SELECT article_id AS "articleId", email, planitem_id AS "planitemId", likecnt, viewcnt, regdate, title, content, image AS "planitemImg" FROM (SELECT CEIL(rownum / #{pageSize}) request_page, article_id, email, planitem_id , likecnt, viewcnt, regdate, title, content, image FROM (SELECT article_id, email, a.planitem_id, likecnt, viewcnt, regdate, title, content, p.image FROM articles a, planitems p
and a.planitem_id = p.planitem_id
and acreage BETWEEN 1 and 2 and acreage BETWEEN 3 and 4 and acreage BETWEEN 5 and 7 and acreage BETWEEN 8 and 9 and acreage >= 10
ORDER BY
likecnt DESC viewcnt DESC regdate DESC )) WHERE request_page = #{page}

ORDER BY
